title: mris_exvivo_surfaces
description: FreeSurfer tool to position tessellation of the cortical surface at the white and gray matter surfaces, and generate relevant surface files.

omit_self_intersection.title: Omit Self Intersection Flag
omit_self_intersection.description: Omit self-intersection check and only generate gray/white surface.

create_curvature_area.title: Create Curvature and Area Flag
create_curvature_area.description: Create curvature and area files from white matter surface.

average_curvature.title: Average Curvature
average_curvature.description: Average curvature values a specified number of times.

white_only.title: White Matter Only Flag
white_only.description: Only generate the white matter surface.

formalin.title: Formalin Assumption
formalin.description: Assume hemisphere is in formalin, with provided value indicating presence (0,1).
